appDescription.message: Reduce annoying 404 pages by automatically checking for an archived copy in the Wayback Machine.

bannerText.description: Inform the user that the page is not available.

bannerTextDescription.message: Do you want to check if a saved version is available on the Wayback Machine?
bannerTextDescription.description: Inform the user about the option to load the page via Wayback Machine.

bannerButton.description: Text for the action button that loads an archived page whenever it is available.
